titles.title: A bill to withhold all United States funds from the United Nations unless the United Nations carries out certain administrative and budgetary reforms.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6453-6455)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8420-8422)

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Prohibits U.S. funds from being made available to the United Nations or any of its agencies unless the President certifies to the Congress that the United Nations: (1) has established a permanent position of inspector general and he has begun to carry out his duties; and (2) is conducting and reviewing budgetary audits and implementing corrective measures, if necessary.
